datoCmsKey.bio:
I'm an Aries Slytherin from a field in South Carolina but I've just reached common law status with New York. I have one cat (Mu, a Libra Hufflepuff) but am constantly taking on new day jobs in the hopes of affording another - preferably a ginger cat. I love working on new plays / musicals and love meeting new collaborators. 

IG: @makaelamshealy; @thegapplay
